title: Quarkus >= 3.3.0 can't find new MockitoConfig
body:
### Describe the bug

Hey, I am updating Quarkus from 3.2.6 to latest. 
In doing so i got issues replacing the old JUnit Injectmock with Arguments with the new MockitoConfig.
The Jenkis I use does not find the new Annotion despite IntelliJ saying it exitis with the same dependency file.

### Expected behavior

The new place of InjectMock and MockitoConfig gets Used as it was prior to 3.3.x

### Actual behavior

Jenkis and IntelliJ can't find the MockitoConfig annotaion

### How to Reproduce?

Update Quarkus in settings.gradle & build.gradle to 3.3.0 or above
Replace all imports with the new place of JUnit Mockito in the io.quarkus Namespace

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux ENGBUILDVM291 5.15.90.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 #1 SMP Fri Jan 27 02:56:13 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

Eclipse Temurium 17.0.9.9 Docker

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.3.0+

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
